Messages.Author: Denes Fischer
Messages.Content: Hi, there will be an online consultation regarding the CFD-assignment next Tuesday (09.07.24) 10:30. If there are any questions regarding the assignment feel free to join, we will be using the Zoom link for online lectures. Please be on time, since we will close the session when all questions seem to have been answered. Best regards, Denes

Messages.Author: Denes Fischer
Messages.Content: Hi, unfortunately we will have to shift the consultation to Thursday (11.07.24) 10:30. Apologies for the short notice.  Best regards, Denes

Messages.Author: Denes Fischer
Messages.Content: Hi, since not all of you could make it today, we will give it another try on Monday 12:00.  Best regards, Denes

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Reminder: Guest lecturers from Audi and Alstom/Bombardier

Messages.Author: Christian Nayeri
Messages.Content: Hi, on Wednesday we will have an aerodynamicists from Audi giving a lecture and on Friday from Alstom/Bombardier! Kind regards, Navid

Messages.Author: Christian Nayeri
Messages.Content: Dear all, please register for the exam (as far as it concerns you): Exam admission #50162v2: Automobil- und Bauwerksumströmung Until Mai 31. Thanks and kind regards, Navid

Messages.Author: Christian Nayeri
Messages.Content: Registration is open again until June 21...

Messages.Author: Christian Nayeri
Messages.Content: Dear all, after a discussion with the students during the lecture on last Wednesday we decided to have an in-person lecture by Prof. Löfdahlon Monday 10 July 16:15-17:45. It will be recorded and hybrid. Wednesday 12 and Friday 14 July will be thus no lecure at all. See you hopefully Monday! Have an nice Sunday. Navid

Messages.Author: Christian Nayeri
Messages.Content: Hi all, I have prepared two polls. Both are related to the possibility to replace Zoom-lectures by in-person lecture from Prof. Löfdahl. Please let me know you choice as soon as possible:  Long lecture with Prof. Löfdahl on Friday July 7? In-Person lecture with Prof. Löfdahl on July 10th or 11th 16:15-17:45?  Depending on the majority of the choices, I would schedule the lectures...  Navid

Messages.Author: Christian Nayeri
Messages.Content: Sorry, I mixed June with July. Please correct yours selections...

Messages.Author: Christian Nayeri
Messages.Content: Thank you very much for your replies. The majority was pro having a long in-person lecture on Friday 7 from 9 till 12. So we will do that.  Regarding July 10th or 11th the majority was pro sticking with the planned zoom-lecture on Friday July 14th. So this reminas unchanged.

Messages.Author: Christian Nayeri
Messages.Content: Hi, next week Prof. Löfdahl will give lectures on Road vehicle aerodynamics via zoom. The zoom-link is provided on ISIS. There is no in-person lecture in week 22! Wishing you interesting lectures, Navid

Messages.Author: Christian Nayeri
Messages.Content: Please from groups of 3-4 by using this poll and read the assignment. Regards, Navid

Messages.Author: Christian Nayeri
Messages.Content: Hi, I have published the presentations dates in the schedule with respect to the topic numbers. The first presentations are due next Tuesday. Please plan accordingly. Kind regards, Navid

Messages.Author: Philip Gloyer
Messages.Content: Hello everybody, my Name is Philip and I will conduct the Wind Tunnel Measurement Campaign on the 17th and 20th of June with you. Therefore, we are offering four time slots for you to choose from to participate. The Wind Tunnel Slot Selection is limited and will be available starting today at 5:00 p.m. Here, the principle of first come, first served applies. As the campaign is not graded, you can select your preferred slot regardless of your previously chosen groups. Please recap the topics of Aerodynamic Forces/Force Coefficients (e.g. F D , F L , c D , c L ) as well as the Reynolds Number (formula and meaning) in preparation for the campaign. Best, Philip

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Scientific paper topics are now available

Messages.Author: Christian Nayeri
Messages.Content: Dear all, please select here your topic. You have time until 8 Mai. Kind regards, Navid

Messages.Author: Christian Nayeri
Messages.Content: Dear all,  I have added two more topic areas to be selected for those who have not been able to select one.  Kind regards,  Navid

Messages.Author: Christian Nayeri
Messages.Content: Dear all, I have changed the lecture room to HF212 in Müller-Breslau-Str. 8 for Wednesday and Friday. Please use this door code to enter: 1609#. The room is on the second floor. See you tomorrow! Navid

Messages.Author: Cedric Marlin Epler
Messages.Content: Hello, I wrote an E-Mail to the address of Dr. Christian Nayeri given on the slides. It seems like I can't reach him this way. Could you check if it is his current E-Mail address?  For the case that Christian Nayeri is out of office, another person's contact details would be helpful. Best regards  Cedric

Messages.Author: Tristan Ratzsch
Messages.Content: Hello Mr. Nayeri, could you upload the lectures of professor L. Löfdahl from last Friday and Monday? Thank you!

Messages.Author: Roberto D Ambrosio
Messages.Content: Good evening professor. I am writing to ask where I can find the recording of Professor L. Löfdahl's last lecture of Friday. Thank you and best regards!

Messages.Author: Denes Fischer
Messages.Content: Hi, the recording is now available:  Lecture 2  Best regards, Denes

Messages.Author: Jules Didier Loeizig Penel
Messages.Content: Dear Professor,  I hope you're good.  I wanted to ask you if it is possible or not to perform the CFD analysis on other software (STAR CCM+ and ANSYS fluent) since we have them on our computer already. Thank you very much,  Best regards, Jules Penel.

Messages.Author: Christian Nayeri
Messages.Content: Yes, you can replace Simscale by your own choice as written in the assignment.

Messages.Author: Jules Didier Loeizig Penel
Messages.Content: thank you very much for your answer !
